note:
Just your friendly neighborhood Charlie Park.

I'm in Oakland most of the time, but try to go hiking on Mt. Tam as often as I can. I write software for Oxide, but try to orient most of my time and priorities around my non-work life.

Not sure what I'll end up posting here, but (like most of you) I sure do miss the early web, so might try to focus on the fun, community, and maker spirit of the early years.
